entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Stephenville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:52 PM NST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -0.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Stephenville Airport 8:12 PM NST Friday 30 December 2022
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -0.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.1 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 84 %
Wind Chill: -4
Dewpoint: -2.7°C
Wind: E 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Periods of rain beginning after midnight except periods of snow over higher terrain. Risk of freezing rain near midnight. Fog patches developing before morning. Rainfall amount 2 mm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this evening then southwest 30 gusting to 50 before morning. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 8 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Showers. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Showers. Flurries over higher terrain in the morning. Fog patches. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Showers ending in the evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Fog patches. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Temperature steady near plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 30 December 2022
